AI Description: PyTorch3D is a library for deep learning with 3D data, offering a modular and efficient differentiable rendering pipeline for 3D computational geometry deep learning research. It provides a variety of high-performance, modular components for 3D computer vision and graphics tasks.
Core Features: Differentiable Rendering Pipeline, High-Performance Modular Components, Support For 3D Geometric Computer Vision Tasks, Integration With Pytorch Ecosystem
General Tags: Deep Learning, 3D Data, Computer Vision, Graphics, Modular Components
